item.title: California Floods Show the Limits of Man-Made Solutions
item.description: California Floods Show the Limits of Man-Made Solutions California is experiencing a series of historic floods that have caused widespread damage. The floods are a result of a combination of factors, including climate change, development, and poor infrastructure. Man-made solutions, such as levees and dams, have not been able to prevent the floods.
